p: All gene alignments and analyses are available at https://leicester.figshare.com/s/24e2782f537d2c77af60. Sequence reads were deposited in the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA), while assembled contigs were deposited into the https://pubmlst.org/neisseria/ database and are accessible through the https://pubmlst.org/ website using the BIGSdb platform ( 52). The identification (ID) numbers for the isolates in this database are as follows: 28247 to 28298 for the paired isolates from the 25 carriers, 28299 to 28338 for the 39 isolates from carrier V59, and 53889 to 53967 for the multiple isolates from five other carriers.
